title: Derren Brown - Seance & Messiah - Debunking Christianity
description:
In these two highly entertaining, but thought-provoking TV series Derren Brown, the famous British magician, shows just how easy it is to manipulate ordinary people into believing in supernatural activity. In his show 'Messiah' he pretends to be a born-again Christian who is able to instantly convert sceptics to Christianity, which he duly does. He also debunks other spiritual powers such as mindreading and the like. And in his show 'Seance' he makes intelligent, sceptical university students believe in the appearance of a ghost and scares the living daylights out of them. All this shows that religion can be easily 'simulated' and shown to be fake and empty. Apart from educational his shows are incredibly entertaining and mindblowing. Forget the likes of David Copperfield whose magic has no substance to it. Derren Brown is a new breed of magician who seems to have superhuman powers and incredible insight into the workings of the mind as well as illusion/delusion. Not to be missed! Also read his book 'Tricks of the Mind'. 

Derren Brown, Richard Dawkins, and Pat Condell are the strongest defenders of free thinking in Britain today and are trying to stem the tide against religious tyranny and indoctrination. Support them or lose our most precious possession: democracy!
